articles.title: When Chelsea will play Lille in Champions League round of 16 as fixture dates confirmed - Football.London
articles.description: The Blues will face the French champions in both February and March as they attempt to continue the defence of their European crown
articles.content:
Chelsea now know exactly when they will take on French champions Lille after being drawn together in the Champions League round of 16.
